skill_description: Responsible for both front-end and back-end development, including databases, servers, and clients.
Focuses on server-side logic, databases, APIs, and security to power web applications.
Deals with creating the user interface, ensuring responsiveness, and building a seamless user experience.
Involves creating software applications, algorithms, and problem-solving solutions.
Manages databases, ensures data integrity, and optimizes storage systems.
Combines development and operations to automate infrastructure, deployment, and scaling.
